verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana unihifadhi mimi
nakulilia wewe
mchana kutwa. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Unisikilize/maana mimi ni fukara, ee Bwana.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wewe ni Mungu wangu/unionee huruma,
ee Bwana.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Wewe u mwema/na mwenye huruma, ee Bwana.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Umejaa upendo/kwa wote wanaokuomba, ee Bwana.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Usikie sala yangu/uangalie kilio changu, ee Bwana.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Hakuna Mungu/aliye kama wewe, ee Bwana.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Hakuna awezaye kufanya/unavyofanya wewe,
ee Bwana.
